DOC.brief_summary: Randomized, placebo-controlled trial of 9 sessions of computerized attentional bias training on attentional bias and on symptoms of Posttraumatic Stress Disorder.
DOC.brief_title: Attentional Bias Modification in Patients With Posttraumatic Stress Disorder
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of Posttraumatic Stress Disorder Diagnosis of psychosis, drug or alcohol dependency/abuse; Unable to fill in questionnaires in Dutch; Color blindness (Stroop test).
